allTitles: {"en":"Avoid Covid-19","swh":"KÛRIGÎÎRIA MÛRIMO WA KORONA","thk":"KÛRIGÎÎRIA MÛRIMO WA KORONA"}

3.eng: Translated by: Susan Nyaga Anzuruni, SIL International

7.eng:
Illustrations:  Ari and Elaine Vitikainen 

Information was taken from WHO websites such as https://www.who.int/emergencies/diseases/novel-coronavirus-2019/advice-for-public

Version 27.3.2020

9.eng: Thaamba njara magiita monthe ûgîtûmagîra cabuni na rûûyî rûgîîtîgaga.

10.eng: Avoid touching eyes, nose and mouth.
10.thk: Tiga gûtonganga ûthiû, mûromo kana nyîûrû.

11.eng: Cover your mouth and nose with your bent elbow or tissue when you cough or sneeze. Dispose  the used tissue immediately.
11.thk: Kororera kana wathimûrîre mbarî ya ndeeni ya ngaakura yaku kana ûtûmîre karataati ga kîoro na ûgate bûra kûbatîîrue.

12.eng: Maintain 2 meters distance between yourself and others.
12.thk: Kara araaya na antû bara bangî (ta mita ciîrî ûgu).

13.eng:
Stay home if you feel unwell.
If you have fever, cough and difficulty breathing, seek medical attention early.
13.thk: Kara muciî weegua ûrî ûmwayie.  Weegua ûrî na rûkorora, kûbîîyanîra mwîîrî, kana kûremwa i kûbeeba bwega, îthi cibitaarî.

14.eng: Stay informed on the latest developments about COVID-19. Follow advice given by your healthcare provider.
14.thk: Kara ûkîthiingatagîîra bûra gûkwenderea mantûûni meegiî Korona na ûrûthe bûra atoongoria bakuuga.

bookText.eng:
Avoid Covid-19


Translated by: Susan Nyaga Anzuruni, SIL International


Avoid Covid-19
Illustrations:  Ari and Elaine Vitikainen 

Information was taken from WHO websites such as https://www.who.int/emergencies/diseases/novel-coronavirus-2019/advice-for-public

Version 27.3.2020
Literacy for Women in Africa
Thaamba njara magiita monthe ûgîtûmagîra cabuni na rûûyî rûgîîtîgaga.


Avoid touching eyes, nose and mouth.

Cover your mouth and nose with your bent elbow or tissue when you cough or sneeze. Dispose  the used tissue immediately.



Maintain 2 meters distance between yourself and others.


Stay home if you feel unwell.
If you have fever, cough and difficulty breathing, seek medical attention early.


Stay informed on the latest developments about COVID-19. Follow advice given by your healthcare provider.
bookText.swh:
KÛRIGÎÎRIA MÛRIMO WA KORONA





KÛRIGÎÎRIA MÛRIMO WA KORONA
bookText.thk:
KÛRIGÎÎRIA MÛRIMO WA KORONA






KÛRIGÎÎRIA MÛRIMO WA KORONA




Tiga gûtonganga ûthiû, mûromo kana nyîûrû.
Kororera kana wathimûrîre mbarî ya ndeeni ya ngaakura yaku kana ûtûmîre karataati ga kîoro na ûgate bûra kûbatîîrue.

Kara araaya na antû bara bangî (ta mita ciîrî ûgu).
Kara muciî weegua ûrî ûmwayie.  Weegua ûrî na rûkorora, kûbîîyanîra mwîîrî, kana kûremwa i kûbeeba bwega, îthi cibitaarî.
Kara ûkîthiingatagîîra bûra gûkwenderea mantûûni meegiî Korona na ûrûthe bûra atoongoria bakuuga.

summary: Basic information on how to avoid Coronavirus (Covid-19)
title: KÛRIGÎÎRIA MÛRIMO WA KORONA
